post.body: Absolutely agree Howard--ppt is just a tool. Can be used badly or really well. Tufte groupies can be a bit lemmingish. LOL
is on twitter? Just testing...heheh
LOL Keep trying to zoom in/out on web pages. Re to read: download Lessig Free Culture http://www.free-culture.cc/freecontent
Dmitri Williams is N. Yee's PhD advisor. Does that extend to Dmitri? What got to you? Grad student fame is quite a new phenom.
I bet the Philip Rosedale DVD is same as fora.tv archive. http://is.gd/brCN Long Now Foundation>Stuart Brand>Whole Earth Films
@edwebb returning to SL and looking for edupunks. Can you help? When is next zombie attack? LOL
@edwebb coming back to SL! Offer him a tour of your fave haunts. :-)
wow big news! Lessig moves back east. I knew after you, but that's not news. Caught your #leweb gig--cool!
welcome to the lower Midwest. Sort of. Heheh
I think there may be some who don't. I wonder. Brain chemistry?
LOL--you can't have my autograph until you tell me what cool parties you are attending tonite!
Did the pixton link work for you BW? What's the ermm (two mms!) about? Why don't you make a comic about...hmmm...SL?
You are too fast for me! I expect you've found the link in my follow-up correction tweets.
I'm batting about zero--called you @botgirlquesti in last tweet. This is the picxton link. http://pixton.com/comic/f9uzxhl5 heheh
oops...Edublog Awards info link... http://tinyurl.com/3rkxuf
Are you coming to the Edublog Awards ceremony tomorrow on Jokaydia? Speaking of awesome projects...heheh
Shiny? Something?? Where???
I've had people finally get around to FB friending months after the invitation was sent. Probably just busy or it's buried.
I do believe I told you it would be. Tons of SL peeps on FB. heheh
Methinks the Gruber fireball was more in the title than in the blog post.
That's a different Chris Lott than the one they are looking for, I think. (chris-lott vs chrislott)
TMI in primetime LOL!
I'm shining a flashlight in your direction--is it helping at all? :-)
I'm definitely waiting for your take on the Alan Kay talk. Seemed a touch too cranky and old school to me, but will defer.
got a Twitter Grade of 97/100 from @grader. See: http://tinyurl.com/a7cuky
Here I am...where are you? LOL
Wish I could have been at @CatinStack 's presentation. Bet it rocked. :-)
Whoops! Doing a tour of Jokaydia for an SL newbie and didn't check twitter for awhile. Sorry to miss the event!
You have been a busy bee!! Love the new mountains on the NE corner of Jokaydia III!
Come on over to Rockcliffe if you can! http://tinyurl.com/8534az
And your hair is a lovely carrot color too. :-) Love your new profile pic.
The Rockliffe U research in second life is in 15 minutes, right?
Work alone = avoid interruptions (merely) LOL
Posted Second Life work on Koinup: http://www.koinup.com/ChimeraCosmos/work/95972/
Can you use some inspiration? http://inspiration.alltop.com/
Posted Second Life work on Koinup: http://www.koinup.com/ChimeraCosmos/work/95930/
Posted Second Life work on Koinup: http://www.koinup.com/ChimeraCosmos/work/95828/
Posted Second Life work on Koinup: http://www.koinup.com/ChimeraCosmos/work/95826/
Want to be the next Spielberg? Check out http://filmmaking.alltop.com/
testing Twitterer HUD from SL
Apple TV Dexter download. Night!
Assuming we can call Everquest II MMO a "virtual world"...it is, right?
Gender diff & virtual worlds: Dmitri Williams - Terra Nova http://is.gd/biYv + link to paper w/Nick Yee. More papers: http://is.gd/brpJ
OK. I got ~70 new followers in the last week. Me! What's up with that? Is Mr. Tweet on the loose again? heheh
Actually, the point was to test out http://pixton.com. Botgirl came to mind as a convenient victim. The verdict: Pixton is kinda fun.
Oops! My pixton.com comic re: @botgirlquesti is at http://pixton.com/comic/f9uzxhl5
Created comic with http://pixton.com as tribute to @botgirlq from SL. Her--talented../me not so much! Her blog: http://botgirl.blogspot.com
Geek out with "Gettin Geeky" show w/ Gina Schreck. Tech for non-techies. http://tinyurl.com/55p2yl
"Everyone is on Facebook" and "Everyone is on Twitter" - different "everyone" but TONS of overlap. Yes?
Want to stay on top of Congress? http://senate.alltop.com/ and http://houseofrepresentatives.alltop.com/
I think Al put some letters that spew particles over Chimera's head while she was meditating in Jokaydia. Hmmm....
Checking out @MrTweet, my personal assistant for discovering the great followers and influencers in my network! http://mrtweet.net?c=11!
RT @BevanWhitfield: @NickWilson omg I adore Dick! Hope you guys have a great meeting! (/me *loves* Coug too)
Total info about PhotoShop: http://photoshop.alltop.com/
Check out this Connectivism/21st century learning video in @leelevever style. Brilliant! First saw this via AJ @sorry_afk http://is.gd/esp7
Cathy Davidson (@catinstack) trifecta Part 1 - Digital Media and Learning at the MLA - http://is.gd/erjz Must read!!
Late for the Rockcliffe U discussion on research in Virtual Worlds...c u later! http://tinyurl.com/8534az
Cool! The Drexler's 21st Century Networked Student in LeFever "Plain English" style. Saw this first via @sorry_afk. #CCK08 http://is.gd/9gUp
Little time for my environmental scanning this past week. Feeling out of touch.
Total info about PhotoShop: http://photoshop.alltop.com/
